main event: On April 6, 1966, three witnesses reported observing an unidentified flying object in Shreveport, Louisiana.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be as large as a house, shaped like a round derby hat,The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes,The object had a beige color with red and orange flashing lights,The witnesses did not hear any sound associated with the object,The report noted the lack of physical evidence and concluded with insufficient data for evaluation.
witness description: Miss C, a 15-year-old student, reported the sighting. Other witnesses were also noted but not detailed in the report.
